name: i18nexus-tools
description: CLI tools for i18nexus - automate i18n workflows with code transformation, translation extraction, and Google Sheets integration

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:manual
scripts.build:manual: mkdir -p dist/{bin,scripts} && npx tsc scripts/*.ts --outDir dist/scripts --module commonjs --target es2020 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --declaration && npx tsc bin/*.ts --outDir dist/bin --module commonjs --target es2020 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --declaration && mv dist/bin/bin/* dist/bin/ 2>/dev/null || true && rmdir dist/bin/bin 2>/dev/null || true && mv dist/bin/scripts/* dist/scripts/ 2>/dev/null || true && rmdir dist/bin/scripts 2>/dev/null || true && chmod +x dist/bin/*.js 2>/dev/null || true

author: i18nexus
